metadata.title: PM congratulates Pakistan team on winning Asian Youth Girls Netball Championship

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 4 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Friday congratulated Pakistan team on winning the Asian Youth Girls Netball Championship 2025. "A proud moment for the entire nation and yet another great milestone for Pakistan women in sports!," the prime minister wrote on his official social media account on 'X'. He also praised the team for their remarkable performance, saying, "Special appreciation for staying undefeated throughout the tournament! Very well played!"
